Text:
UPDATE: sometimes it is lagging on my Macbook Air (late 2009). 
Share your experience on tougher machines.

Would not boot on mine
OSX 10.6.7 13in MBP

Would not boot on mine
OSX 10.6.7 MacPro(2008)

Had no problem running the game. Very smooth with no lag at all, though graphics were a bit pixelated but all in all, a perfect port.

MacBook Air (late 2010 model)
1.4GhZ Intel Dual Core
2 GB Ram
256 mb nVidia 320m
Mac OS X 10.7.2 Lion
oops..sorry, I meant 1.4GhZ Intel Core 2 Duo, not dual core
